body.name: Ubiquiti AmpliFi Alien AX 7685 Tri Band Mesh Wi-Fi 6 Router, Black (AFI-ALN-R-US) (AFIALNRUS)
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by TECHOME.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 4 mins
Or fastest pickup Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 49 mins
features: Elegantly designed router brings revolutionary Wi-Fi 6 benefits to your home, increasing your network capacity by four times and doubling the coverage. Utilizing MU-MIMO and OFDMA for communication across 12 Wi-Fi 6 spatial streams, the router eliminates dead spots and increases total home network capacity by four times. Meets or exceeds the FCC and IC standards. Secure financial transactions by connecting to your home network using the Teleport VPN app (available for Android and iOS

Features a tri-band radio with 4 x 4 2.4GHz and 8 x 8 5GHz 802.11ax radios optimized for Wi-Fi 6 performance and backwards compatibility with previous Wi-Fi standards. Intuitive AmpliFi app offers instant setup, configuration, powerful reporting metrics, parental controls, remote access, and easy guest access. Ports: 4 x LAN (1Gbps), 1 x WAN port (1Gbps); 1 x power (100-224VAC). Simple and powerful, the system allows for simultaneous 4K/8K UHD streaming and online gaming to multiple clients from

Offers transfer speeds up to 1148Mbps at 2.4GHz and 1733Mbps (low-band)/4804Mbps (high-band) at 5GHz, with a coverage of up to 3000 sq. ft.. Wireless security implemented through WPA2 and VPN: VPN software protects online presence and encrypts your data by granting you secure access to your home network. Maximum Tx power: 23dBm per chain at 2.4GHz, 19dBm per chain (low-band)/20dBm per chain (high-band) at 5GHz. 1-year manufacturer limited warranty.

Uses Tx beamforming (a signal processing technology used in sensor arrays for directional signal transmission). Package includes: AmpliFi Alien router, power cable (6.5'), and Ethernet cable (4.9'). Boasts a 4.7" full-color touch display (glass plus film, 274 x 1268, 279 ppi) for connectivity information.
body.description: Ubiquiti AmpliFi Alien is optimized for lag-free, low-latency performance at Wi-Fi 6 top speeds. The router features a tri-band radio with 4 x 4 2.4GHz and 8 x 8 5GHz 802.11ax radios optimized for Wi-Fi 6 performance and backwards compatibility with previous Wi-Fi standards. The third radio (4 x 4) can be enabled to enhance performance of 5GHz Wi-Fi 5 devices. Beyond the breakthrough Wi-Fi performance, AmpliFi Alien offers all the software features praised by the growing AmpliFi user base, including simple setup, powerful connected device management, and a free, zero-configuration VPN service through the AmpliFi Teleport app that places travelers within their home network like they never left. The AmpliFi Alien router is designed to be showcased in your home, featuring a touch-screen display for connectivity information. Powered by 8 x 8 MIMO Wi-Fi 6 technology, a single AmpliFi Alien router performs with far greater range and speeds than previous Wi-Fi solutions. Additional AmpliFi Alien routers (sold separately) can be meshed together to extend gigabit speeds throughout even the largest homes. In addition to the expanded Wi-Fi coverage, you'll have four LAN ports and one Internet port to connect wired devices at each location.- Elegantly designed router brings revolutionary Wi-Fi 6 benefits to your home, increasing your network capacity by four times and doubling the coverage.- Features a tri-band radio with 4 x 4 2.4GHz and 8 x 8 5GHz 802.11ax radios optimized for Wi-Fi 6 performance and backwards compatibility with previous Wi-Fi standards.- Offers transfer speeds up to 1148Mbps at 2.4GHz and 1733Mbps (low-band)/4804Mbps (high-band) at 5GHz, with a coverage of up to 3000 sq. ft.- Uses Tx beamforming (a signal processing technology used in sensor arrays for directional signal transmission).- Utilizing MU-MIMO and OFDMA for communication across 12 Wi-Fi 6 spatial streams, the router eliminates dead spots and increases total home network

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great signal and Scalability
reviews.reviewText: I ordered (2)two instances of the device. The first came and the internal fan wasn't working. The support team was UBER responsive and replaced it, in 2-days!!! This system is extremely easy to configure and manage; and it looks elegant and sexy. The VPN "teleport" is extremely easy to install and use , so that all my devices can reach my home network. If your not using a VPN for your home network use it!!! Great for scaling network QoS for gaming, streaming, etcIf I had to say something bad... the screen font is too small. But I then realized I needed glasses :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great til it wasn’t
reviews.reviewText: Had this product for about a year and a half. Great product until it started having problems. It used to be able to connect to all my devices phone, laptop, tablet, and tv. But for some reason it can connect to everything but the tvs. I find that a bit odd. I bought this product thinking it would last a good couple of years not a year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Still learning all of its features actions but so far so good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I installed four of these and not only my home but also my entire yard is completely covered. Easy set up and seamless operation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best WiFi router I’ve owned.
reviews.reviewText: This is the most stable router I’ve had and I’m running the beta software. It has great range with one and i recently bought a 2nd one just so I could have range for my outside cameras. I have a 2,500 Sq ft house 1 covered it very well. It also have a nice VPN app that works well with the router. I tried the Asus ZenWiFi AX6600 but this is a lot more stable and I don’t have WiFi dropping like I did with the Asus. I’ve owned this router for more than a year and really appreciate it. The company makes great enterprise equipment too and know what they are doing. I went to school for a network specialist and have my CCNA and and have dabbled in a fair share of networking equipment. Give this a shot, I don’t think you’ll be disappointed. Take care!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive, but worth every penny!
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I both work from home and are heavy internet users. We've had this router for over a year now, not a single problem with it! Never needed to contact support never had issues with wifi signal. Bought it for my parents too because they kept having issues with other brands and they never complained to us again! Highly recommend 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Sent back - used product didn’t work
reviews.reviewText: Sent back - used product didn’t work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worked great when it worked
reviews.reviewText: I loved everything about this router. Setup was easy and the control given was perfect. Everything was fast and connection was strong all through the house. If I didn't have any issues it would be an easy 5 star.I don't know if the problem was with the router being a lemon or some issue with the signal coming in from the modem. But after 6 hours of great strong use it just stopped broadcasting. SSID gone. Anything wired in was good to go though. After rebooting both router and modem it came back on. Only to die an hour later. After dealing with this for a few hours I unfortunately had to request a refund. Old router has been up nonstop without issues since.

reviews.reviewTitle: Dejaba de funcionar el WiFi solo funciona por Cable
reviews.reviewText: Pasaban alrededor de 1 semana y la WiFi desaparecía por completo, no era rastrearle por ningún aparato. Tenia que renunciar de fabrica y eso a veces tenia que hacerlo mas de una vez. Por cable todo funcionaba. Fue una lata que hiciera eso tan frecuente y terminé mejor regresándolo. Mientras si estaba funcionando, es una maravilla, lástima que me falló demasiado. Tenia Infinitum a 1Gbps, 25+ dispositivos conectados en un departamento de 120m2. En esas condiciones me resultó muy malo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Very quick to setup and signal good and the teleport VPN works great.
reviews.reviewText: I used it mainly for teleport VPNVery nice router

reviews.reviewText: Signal in house was almost non existent in certain rooms due to the construction, age and lay-out. This has made a massive difference
